Package com.dhemery.core

Construct objects, evaluate objects, and perform actions.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Action<S> An action that acts on a subject.
Builder<T> Builds an object of type T.
Condition A condition that may be satisfied or dissatisfied.
Decorator<T>  
Feature<S,F> Retrieves the value of a feature for a subject.
Lazy<T> A lazy supplier that caches the first value it supplies, and always yields the cached value.
MaybePresent An object that may be present.
MaybeVisible An object that may be visible.
Sampler<V> Samples a variable and retains the sample.
SelfDescribingBuilder<T> A builder that can describe itself.
SelfDescribingSupplier<T> A supplier that can describe itself.
Supplier<T> Supplies a value of type T.
 

Class Summary
Built  
ConditionAssert Asserts that a condition is satisfied.
FeatureSampler<S,F> A sampler that samples a feature of a subject.
Lazily Lazy suppliers.
MatcherFeature<S> A feature that evaluates whether a subject matches a matcher.
Named An object that describes itself by a fixed name.
NamedAction<S> An action that describes itself with a fixed name.
NamedBuilder<T> A builder that describes itself with a fixed name.
NamedCondition A condition that describes itself with a fixed name.
NamedFeature<S,F> A feature that describes itself with a fixed name.
NamedSampler<V> A sampler that describes itself with a fixed name.
NamedSupplier<T> A supplier that describes itself with a fixed name.
PresentFeature A feature that determines whether its MaybePresent subject is present.
Repeat Repeats an action until a condition is satisfied.
SamplerCondition<V> A condition that is satisfied when a sampled variable satisfies some criteria.
Supplied  
SuppliedLazy<T> Lazily supplies an object obtained from another supplier.
Until Repeats an action until a condition is satisfied.
VisibleFeature A feature that determines whether its MaybeVisible subject is visible.
 

Package com.dhemery.core Description

Construct objects, evaluate objects, and perform actions.
